text: Zenkerellinae is a subfamily of "pygmy scaly-tailed flying squirrels" which was classified in 1898 by Paul Matschie. Zenkerellinae gives rise to two genera of african rodents: Idiurus and Zenkerella. ==References== Category:Rodents of Africa Category:Taxa named by Paul Matschie Category:Mammal subfamilies Category:Anomalures
title: Zenkerellinae
